description: This file defines functions for interacting with a books API, including fetching a list of books with pagination and search capabilities, and retrieving details of a specific book by ID.

methods.name: listBooks({ q = '', page = 1, pageSize = 12 } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of books with optional search query.

methods.name: getBook(id)
methods.description: Fetches details of a single book by its ID.

ctags.name: listBooks
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listBooks({ q = '', page = 1, pageSize = 12 } = {}) {$/
